get.summary: Fetch all questions based on the user's stream
Fetch all questions created by me

200.description: List of questions created by me

post.description: Adds a new question to the forum for the authenticated user.

question.example: What is the best way to improve my coding skills?
What is the best way to improve my coding skills?

put.summary: Update a question by its ID if only created Question by Authenticated user
put.description: Update a question created by the authenticated user. Performs validation for uniqueness, stream type, and updates the question details.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the question to be updated

requestBody.description: Request body to update the question

question.example: What is the capital of Nepal?
What is the capital of Nepal?

400.description: Stream type does not match for the student

message.example: Stream type does not match for the student

404.description: Question not found or already deleted

message.example: Question not found or already deleted

409.description: The user has already created this question

message.example: You have already created this question

get.summary: Get a question by its ID Created By authenticated user
get.description: Fetch the details of a question if the authenticated user is the owner. Unauthorized access will return a 403 response.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the question to be fetched

question.example: What is the capital of Nepal?

403.description: Unauthorized access, the user is not the owner of the question

message.example: You are not authorized to access this question

get.summary: Get a question by its ID
get.description: Fetch the details of a specific question by its ID. Only the owner of the question can view the details.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the question

question.example: What is the capital of Nepal?

delete.summary: Delete a question by its ID
delete.description: Deletes a question if the authenticated user is the owner of the question.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the question to be deleted

post.summary: Add an answer to a question
post.description: Allows authenticated students to add an answer to a specified question in the forum.

question_id.description: ID of the question being answered.

answer.example: To improve your coding skills, practice daily and engage with community projects.
To improve your coding skills, practice daily and engage with community projects.

items.example: The question id field is required

post.description: Register a new user with username, password, fullname, email, and role. Triggers email verification.
